page.title: 12DAY IN THE LIFE OF CAROLE
page.content: MY NAME IS CAROLE ANNE CLAYTON AND I LIVE ON BABWORTH HOME FARM.I GET UP AT 7.00AM AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST USUALLY CORNFLAKES AND APPLE JUICE. I CLEAN MY TEETH HAVE A WASH AND GET DRESSED. MUM GETS OUR BIKES OUT AND WE CYCLE DOWN TO THE BUS STOP IT IS NOW 8.10AM.A LOCAL BUS COMPANY,VICKERS, PICKS UP SEVERAL CHILDREN TO TAKE THEM TO OUR SCHOOL IN RANBY SCHOOL STARTS AT 8.45AM. AND OUR FIRST LESSON IS MATHEMATICS AFTER THAT WE DO SOUND WORK AND RECORDER PRACTICE. BREAK IS AT 10.30 AND LASTS FOR FIFTEEN MINUTES.IN THE HOUR BEFORE LUNCH WE GENERALLY DO TOPIC WORK,AT THE MOMENT IT IS ON THE SEA AS A GROUP ARE GOING ON A VISIT TO WHITBY. LUNCH IS TAKEN IN THE SCHOOL HALL. MOST CHILDREN HAVE A COOKED LUNCH BUT I TAKE SANDWICHES. AFTERNOON SCHOOL STARTS AT 12.55 PM.
